requestParams.name: retail_source
requestParams.desc: 零售调用来源(调用方和有赞约定的值)

children.name: status
children.desc:
单据状态:
TO_CHECK=待审核
TO_OUT=待出库
TO_IN=待入库
REFUSED=已驳回
CLOSED=已关闭
FINISHED=已完成
OUT_DOING=出库执行中
IN_DOING=入库执行中

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['biz_bill_no']="RDB0031903010001"
params['retail_source']="GUANYIYUN"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.retail.open.distributionorder.get', '3.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)

'RDB0031903010001', 'retail_source' => 'GUANYIYUN', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(
    $client->post($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);
echo '
';
